ing: 1 fluid ounce sweet and sour mix
1 fluid ounce cola, or to taste
n: The REAL Long Island Iced Tea
des: "There are a few impostors out there that claim to be Long Island Iced Teas. In actuality, there is only one correct way to make a LIIT... and this is it!"
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour vodka, rum, gin, tequila, triple sec, and sour mix over ice; cover and shake. Pour cocktail into a Collins or hurricane glass; top with splash of cola for color. Garnish with a lemon slice.
